resources.string: I am currently speaking about Themes at %2$s %3$s
Lots of Views subclass TextView https://mark.al/TextView %3$s
Easily apply a TextAppearance to part of a string using TextAppearanceSpan https://mark.al/TextAppearanceSpan %3$s
Overlay the current theme using ContextThemeWrapper https://mark.al/ContextThemeWrapper %3$s
The presentation source is at https://mark.al/ThemeOnSource and the articles are at https://mark.al/1turq1F %3$s
